DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of bromfenac ophthalmic solution for treatment in subjects with a history of allergic conjunctivitis
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Topical Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution vs. Placebo in Subjects With Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: History of clinically active allergic conjunctivitis Agree to return for all required visits Agree to avoid disallowed meds Known hypersensitivity to bromfenac and salicylates
